definition.en:
Chattea is a WhatsApp marketing automation platform designed for businesses.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Send mass messages (blast)
‚Ä¢ Schedule messages
‚Ä¢ Manage multiple WhatsApp instances
‚Ä¢ Filter & validate numbers
‚Ä¢ Auto-reply & chatbot tools
‚Ä¢ Analytics & reporting
‚Ä¢ File sharing & contact management

Chattea helps sales, marketing, and customer service teams operate efficiently.

instance_create.en:
To create a new WhatsApp instance:

1. Open the **Instances** tab
2. Click **+ New Instance**
3. Enter a name (e.g., Marketing, Support)
4. Scan the QR code with WhatsApp via: Settings ‚Üí Linked Devices
5. The instance will activate once paired

Each instance represents a separate WhatsApp account you can control from Chattea.

instance_manage.en:
To manage your instances:

1. Open the **Instances** tab
2. You'll see all instances with their statuses (Online/Offline)
3. Click an instance to:
   ‚Ä¢ Edit its name
   ‚Ä¢ Remove/delete it
   ‚Ä¢ View details
   ‚Ä¢ Manage settings

Use this menu to organize multiple WhatsApp accounts.

instance_connect.en:
To connect or pair an instance via QR code:

1. Go to **Instances** ‚Üí Select/Create instance
2. Click **Pair with QR**
3. On your phone: WhatsApp ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Linked Devices ‚Üí Link a Device
4. Scan the QR code shown on Chattea
5. Wait for the connection to establish

You can also use pairing code on supported versions.

instance_status.en:
To check an instance‚Äôs connection status:

1. Open the **Instances** tab
2. Look at the status indicators:
   üü¢ Connected
   üü° Connecting
   üî¥ Disconnected
3. If disconnected:
   ‚Ä¢ Reconnect by clicking **Reconnect**
   ‚Ä¢ Rescan QR code if needed

Stable connection is required for sending messages and blasts.

message_send.en:
To send a message:

1. Choose an active instance
2. Enter the destination number (e.g., 628123456789)
3. Type your message
4. Click **Send**

The message will be delivered immediately.

Tip: Use {name} and other variables with templates for personalization.

message_blast.en:
To send a blast (mass message):

1. Go to **Blast Message** ‚Üí **New Blast**
2. Select contacts, groups, or segments
3. Write your message (variables supported: {name})
4. Preview your message
5. Click **Send Blast**

‚ö† Tips:
‚Ä¢ Avoid blasting too fast to new accounts
‚Ä¢ Break large blasts into chunks
‚Ä¢ Warmup new WhatsApp numbers first

message_schedule.en:
To schedule a message:

1. Compose your message normally
2. Click the **Schedule (‚è∞)** button
3. Select the send date and time
4. Save the scheduled message

Chattea will send it automatically at the chosen time.
You can view/edit scheduled messages in the **Tasks** tab.

message_status.en:
To check the delivery status of a message:

1. Open the **Tasks** or **Blast History** tab
2. Select the message or blast
3. View the status:
   ‚Ä¢ ‚úÖ Sent
   ‚Ä¢ ‚è≥ Pending
   ‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Failed
4. Check detailed logs for delivery results
5. Retry failed messages if available

This helps evaluate campaign performance.

chat_view.en:
To view chats or conversation history:

1. Open the **Chat** tab
2. Select an instance
3. Choose a contact to view the chat thread
4. Scroll through full conversation history

You can search chats and load previous messages as needed.

contacts.en:
Contact Management:

You can:
‚Ä¢ Add contacts
‚Ä¢ Edit/update contact details
‚Ä¢ Delete contacts
‚Ä¢ Import/export contacts (CSV)
‚Ä¢ Filter/search contacts
‚Ä¢ Create segments for campaigns

Open the **Contacts** tab to manage your address book.

groups.en:
To manage or create WhatsApp groups:

1. Go to the **Groups** tab
2. Click **Create Group**
3. Enter group name
4. Add members from your contacts
5. Save the group

You can also export group members or configure group settings depending on platform support.

phone_check.en:
To check whether a phone number is registered on WhatsApp:

1. Open **Tools** ‚Üí **Phone Checker**
2. Enter a phone number or upload a CSV
3. Click **Check**
4. See results:
   ‚Ä¢ ‚úÖ Valid (registered)
   ‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Invalid (not on WhatsApp)

This is recommended before blasts to avoid wasted sends.

account.en:
Account management:

To create an account:
1. Visit chattea.com or open the app
2. Click **Register**
3. Enter email & password
4. Verify email
5. Log in

You can also reset your password or adjust account settings under **Settings ‚Üí Account**.

Open the **Settings** tab to modify your preferences.

templates.en:
Template Management:

Create and use message templates to speed up messaging:
1. Go to **Templates** tab
2. Click **New Template**
3. Write a template using variables like {name}
4. Save and reuse for blasts or messages

Templates help maintain consistency and save time.

‚Ä¢ Preview files
‚Ä¢ Share across instances

Files can be used as attachments in messages and blasts.

Tasks Overview:

‚Ä¢ Monitor blast progress
‚Ä¢ Check failed tasks
‚Ä¢ Retry failed messages
‚Ä¢ Track automation runs

This is your main control center for message scheduling.

troubleshoot.en:
Troubleshooting guide:

Common issues include:
‚Ä¢ QR code not loading
‚Ä¢ Connection timeout
‚Ä¢ Instance disconnected
‚Ä¢ Login problems

Try:
1. Refreshing the page
2. Reconnecting the instance
3. Checking your internet
4. Clearing browser cache
5. Trying a different browser

If issues persist, contact support@chattea.com.

warmup.en:
Warmup Feature:

Warmup prepares new WhatsApp accounts to avoid bans.

How it works:
‚Ä¢ Instances chat with each other automatically
‚Ä¢ Activity increases gradually
‚Ä¢ Human-like delays are used

Recommended duration: 7‚Äì14 days.
Enable under the **Warmup Settings** of an instance.
